text: Stefan Gierasch (February 5, 1926 â€“ September 6, 2014) was an American movie and television actor. He was known for his roles in The Hustler, Jeremiah Johnson, What's Up Doc? High Plains Drifter, and Carrie. Gierasch died on September 6, 2014 in Santa Monica, California at the age of 88.Obituary, legacy.com; accessed September 12, 2014. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1926 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from New York City
